title: The White House passes an AI "Bill of Rights" that attempts to put your AI concerns at ease
description: Today, the White House released the Blueprint for an AI Bill of Rights to set up a framework that can protect people from the negative effects of AI.

title: EU rules that all mobile devices, including iPhones, must support USB-C charging
description: The European Parliament thinks consumers should be able to use a single charging solution for all of their electronic devices.

title: Six ways Cisco Webex beats Microsoft Teams
description: Here's a side-by-side comparison of two of the most-utilized collaboration tools in business today.

title: Debian Linux accepts proprietary firmware in major policy change
description: Instead of being made entirely of free software, the next release of Debian Linux, Bookworm, will include proprietary drivers and firmware.

title: Samsung lays out its plan to mass produce 1.4nm chips by 2027
description: The tech giant is ramping up its semiconductor plans to meet the demand for high-performance computing, AI, 5G, 6G, and automotive applications.

title: Save $45 on Echo Dot, plus 2 LED smart bulbs
description: Upgrade your smart home hub and save $45 with this deal. The Echo Dot-LED smart bulb bundle is on sale for 72% off right now.

title: Boost your storage with 50% off a PNY 500GB SSD
description: Sometimes, your laptop or desktop just needs more storage. Now, you can get an extra 500GB for only $30.

title: How to keep your new iPhone looking like you just bought it
description: The trick is to add the right protection, preferably right from Day 1.

title: Elon Musk reportedly renews his offer to buy Twitter
description: The renewed offer is the latest twist in a continued saga involving the outspoken, eccentric billionaire and the social media platform.

title: Why can't I get Windows 11 22H2 yet?
description: Microsoft has acknowledged a handful of Windows 11 22H2 blockers, but customers are finding more 'safeguard holds' and working to let others know about them.

title: After being smashed into by a NASA spacecraft, the Dimorphos asteroid grows a tail
description: The SOAR Telescope in Chile imaged a 10,000-kilometer long bright streak in space--the aftermath of the Dimorphos asteroid getting slammed into by the DART spacecraft.

title: Google debuts new Nest Doorbell Wired, Nest Wifi Pro and launches fully new Google Home app preview
description: Google may be holding an event later this week, but the company's already announcing new Nest hardware today.

title: This sneaky fraud attack looks like an email forwarded by your boss
description: Business email compromise scammers are getting savvier with their lures - and new attack groups are emerging.

title: Google's Pixel Watch is a big deal. But taking on the Apple Watch is a massive step
description: The arrival of Google's Pixel Watch is a 'landmark event'. But will it be able to challenge the Apple Watch?

title: Is your iPhone 'Charging On Hold'? Here's what it means and what you should do
description: iOS 16 brings a new warning for iPhone users to worry about in the form of "Charging On Hold." Here's what you need to know about it.

title: FBI: Beware of fake batteries, here's what to watch out for
description: Here's how the FBI says consumers should check for authentic batteries and why they should buy batteries with special care.

title: Victims of these online crooks lacked a key security feature. Don't make the same mistake
description: These scammers are gaining access to real accounts that they're using to dupe victims into sending payments. One change could help to stop it.

title: Microsoft Teams: Here's everything new in the last two months
description: Teams finally offers native support for Apple silicon Macs, and it gets more hybrid work features in Microsoft's latest updates.

title: PC deal: Save $1,800 on Lenovo ThinkPad P16s
description: Throw a few coupons together and you end up with an $1800 discount on a Lenovo ThinkPad P16s, a great laptop for remote and hybrid working.

title: Huawei MateBook X Pro (2022) review: A 14-inch ultraportable to rival the best
description: It's not perfect, with moderate battery life and a 720p webcam the main disappointments, but it's not far off.

title: Is that Amazon Early Access Sale deal really a deal?
description: Amazon is hosting two days of deals with a Prime Early Access Sale to boost holiday shopping. But with all the discounts popping up, how do you know you're actually snagging a good deal?
